content.data: Select an Object 3D View

When selecting an Object in 3D View, depending upon the Object Type 
 selected, you gain the ability to change some of that Objects Visual and 
 Material Properties. You can select more than one Object at a time by 
 using    + Left Mouse 
 Click .
ctrl_key.png

See the Right Click on an Object 3D View topic for more 3D Object selection 
 options.
Information.png

The Finish or Texture that is selected will only affect parts using materials 
 that do not have a Finish or Texture assigned.
Information.png
Selecting a Cabinet or Group of Cabinets

When selecting a Cabinet or a group of Cabinets you get the following 
 options in the Room Level Sidebar:
image1089.gif

Visual 
	 - Exterior Finish -  Changes the Exterior Finish on the selected 
	 Object(s). 
 Visual 
	 - Interior Finish -  Changes the Interior Finish on the selected 
	 Object(s). 
 Visual 
	 - Exterior Texture -  Changes the Exterior Texture on the selected 
	 Object(s). 
 Visual 
	 - Interior Texture -  Changes the Interior Texture on the selected 
	 Objects(s). 
 Materials 
	 - Assembly -  Changes the Assembly Material Schedule used for 
	 the selected Cabinet. 
 Materials 
	 - Pulls -  Changes the Pull Material Schedule used for the selected 
	 Cabinet.

Visual 
	 - Exterior Finish -  Changes the Exterior Finish on the selected 
	 Object(s).

	 Object(s).

	 Object(s).

Visual

	 Object(s).

Visual 
	 - Exterior Texture -  Changes the Exterior Texture on the selected 
	 Object(s).

Visual

	 Objects(s).

Visual

Materials

Materials

Materials 
	 - Pulls -  Changes the Pull Material Schedule used for the selected

Selecting an Appliance
image1090.gif

Visual 
	 - Appliance Finish -  Changes the selected Appliance's Finish. 
 Visual 
	 - Handle Finish -  Changes the Handle Finish on the selected 
	 Appliance. 
 Visual 
	 - Finish Type -  Changes the Finish Type on the selected Appliance.
